name: TypeRightr
description: A real-time, competitive, player vs player, typing game.  Complete with user authentication, dynamic difficulty, match history, and rankings.

name: Camrades
description: (Short for Camera Comrades), A real-time collaborative motion-controlled audio and visual experience. It leverages WebSockets to provide a synchronized experience for two seperate clients. Complete with fully mapping of motion to audio and visual parameters.

name: Air Vimeo
description: Aggregates and embeds videos from up to 5 Vimeo channels. Features infinite scroll and sorting by popularity or date.

name: Iframe Chat
description: An application to demonstrate understanding of Javascript fundamentals. Iframes can be dragged and dropped. Implemented with raw javascript.
